title: Uchi no Musume no Tame naraba, Ore wa Moshikashitara Maou mo Taoseru kamo Shirenai (LN) - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Abandoned Children   Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Drama CD   Adapted to Manga   Adopted Children   Adventurers   Age Progression   Award-winning Work   Caring Protagonist   Childcare   Cooking   Cute Children   Cute Story   Demon Lord   Demons   Discrimination   Divine Protection   Doting Love Interests   Doting Parents   Elves   Fantasy World   Friendship   Guardian Relationship   Heartwarming   Heroes   Loli   Magic Beasts   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Monsters   Nobles   Overpowered Protagonist   Parent Complex   R-15   Sword And Magic   Twins
author: Chirolu
description:
A painfully conspicuous master adventurer, Dale.

Due to a certain request, he set foot in a deep forest and by chance, encountered a severely underweight and thin young girl of magic lineage. Unable to leave the girl, Latina who carried the branding of a criminal, Dale reluctantly decided to become her protector. However―

'Because Latina is too cute, I don't want to go to work.'

―Before he realized it, he had completely gained a parent complex!?>
